description: This table contains medication information for the Plan of Care (POC) master file.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the plan of care record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ORDER_MED_ID
columns.description: The unique identifiers for order records associated with current medications that appear in the plan of care.

columns.name: MEDICATION_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for a medication on the plan of care.

columns.name: DISPLAY_NAM
columns.description: This item contains the medication display name at time the POC was created.

columns.name: ORDER_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item contains the medication order class.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Normal

columns.name: PROV_ID
columns.description: This item contains the authorizing provider.

columns.name: FREQ_ID
columns.description: This item contains the medication frequency.

columns.name: FREQ_ID_FREQ_NAME
columns.description: The name of the frequency record.

columns.name: MEDICATION_DOSE
columns.description: This item contains the medication dose.

columns.name: MEDICATION_ROUT_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item contains the medication route.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: MEDICATION_QTY
columns.description: This item contains the medication quantity dispensed.

columns.name: MEDICATION_REFIL
columns.description: This item contains the number of refills.

columns.name: MEDICATION_SIG
columns.description: This item contains the medication sig.

columns.name: MEDICATION_LONG_SIG
columns.description: This item contains the medication long sig.

columns.name: MEDICATION_START_DT
columns.description: This item contains the medication start date.

columns.name: MEDICATION_END_DT
columns.description: This item contains the medication end date.

columns.name: MEDICATION_CMT
columns.description: This item contains the medication comments.

columns.name: MEDICATION_TAKING_DIFF_LINE
columns.description: The line to show in the plan of care if a medication on the plan of care is documented as being taken differently than prescribed.

columns.name: ORDER_MODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This will store whether the medication is ordered as an inpatient or an outpatient med


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Outpatient


Inpatient

columns.name: PRN_REASONS
columns.description: For medications on the hospice plan of care that were ordered PRN, the reason documented for taking the medication.

columns.name: INDICATIONS
columns.description: Indications for a medication on a hospice plan of care.

columns.name: HOSPICE_CVG_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column indicates the hospice coverage status of medications which are pulled to the hospice plan of care.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Hospice Covered


Not Hospice Covered

columns.name: DISCON_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores the discontinued instant (UTC) of medications which are pulled to the hospice plan of care.

columns.name: HSPC_NONCVRD_MED_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason a patient's medication is not covered by the hospice benefit. This appears on the Hospice Plan of Care.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Other
